Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This innovative solution has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards in its field, offering unparalleled benefits and capabilities. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we're offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $20000. We're confident it will provide substantial value to you, surpassing the investment made. Thank you for considering our product, and we look forward to discussing how it can contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
